message:
#AngularJS Video & Sample Code: Using Recursive Templates & ng-include To Create A Tree Hierarchy

(A quick 12 minutes video and very few lines of code)
name: AngularJS Video:Using Templates & ng-include To Create Infinite Tree - GuruStop.NET (Web-dev & C#...
caption: gurustop.net
description: Hello again and welcome to another Angular.JS video. This time I talk briefly about templates in Angular.JS and the ng-include directives, and how to combine them to create recursive templates that can be used to model any number of tree levels.

data.message: I uploaded a newer version of this ~12 minutes video because the audio was too quiet. Try the new version now and let me know if you have any problems or questions :)
